trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux nxFile Resource
trans-unit.target: 适用于 Linux nxFile 资源的 DSC

trans-unit.source: The **nxFile** resource in PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to to manage files and directories on a Linux node.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) 中的 **nxFile** 资源提供了管理 Linux 节点上的文件和目录的机制。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: “属性”

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: DestinationPath
trans-unit.target: DestinationPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location where you want to ensure the state for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定你想确保其中文件或目录状态的位置。

trans-unit.source: SourcePath
trans-unit.target: SourcePath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path from which to copy the file or folder resource.
trans-unit.target: 指定要从其中复制文件或文件夹资源的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path may be a local path, or an `http/https/ftp` URL.
trans-unit.target: 此路径可以是本地路径，或者 `http/https/ftp` URL。

trans-unit.source: Remote `http/https/ftp` URLs are only supported when the value of the **Type** property is file.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 **Type** 属性的值为文件时，才支持远程 `http/https/ftp` URL。

trans-unit.source: Ensure
trans-unit.target: Ensure

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to check if the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否要检查该文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to "Present" to ensure the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为“Present”可确保该文件存在。

trans-unit.source: Set it to "Absent" to ensure the file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为“Absent”可确保该文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Present".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“Present”。

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 类型

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the resource being configured is a directory or a file.
trans-unit.target: 指定正在配置的资源是目录还是文件。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to "directory" to indicate that the resource is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为“directory”可指示该资源是一个目录。

trans-unit.source: Set it to "file" to indicate that the resource is a file.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为“file”可指示该资源是一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "file"
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“file”。

trans-unit.source: Contents
trans-unit.target: 目录

trans-unit.source: Specifies the contents of a file, such as a particular string.
trans-unit.target: 指定文件的内容，例如特定字符串。

trans-unit.source: Checksum
trans-unit.target: 校验和

trans-unit.source: Defines the type to use when determining whether two files are the same.
trans-unit.target: 定义当确定两个文件是否相同时使用的类型。

trans-unit.source: If **Checksum** is not specified, only the file or directory name is used for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定**校验和**，则只是文件或目录名用于比较。

trans-unit.source: Values are: "ctime", "mtime", or "md5".
trans-unit.target: 值为：“ctime”、“mtime”或“md5”。

trans-unit.source: Recurse
trans-unit.target: Recurse

trans-unit.source: Indicates if subdirectories are included.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否包含子目录。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to **$true** to indicate that you want subdirectories to be included.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为 **$true** 以指示你想要包含子目录。

trans-unit.source: The default is **$false**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 **$false**。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property is only valid when the **Type** property is set to directory.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**只有将 **Type** 属性设置为目录时，此属性才有效。

trans-unit.source: Force
trans-unit.target: Force

trans-unit.source: Certain file operations (such as overwriting a file or deleting a directory that is not empty) will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 某些文件操作（如覆盖文件或删除不为空的目录）将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Force** property overrides such errors.
trans-unit.target: 使用 **Force** 属性覆盖此类错误。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **$false**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 **$false**。

trans-unit.source: Links
trans-unit.target: 链接

trans-unit.source: Specifies the desired behavior for symbolic links.
trans-unit.target: 指定符号链接的所需行为。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to "follow" to follow symbolic links and act on the links target (for example.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为“follow”可跟随符号链接，并对链接目标进行操作（例如

trans-unit.source: copy the file instead of the link).
trans-unit.target: 复制文件而不是链接）。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to "manage" to act on the link (for example.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为“manage”可对此链接进行操作（例如

trans-unit.source: copy the link itself).
trans-unit.target: 复制链接本身）。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to "ignore" to ignore symbolic links.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为“ignore”可忽略符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Group
trans-unit.target: 组

trans-unit.source: The name of the **Group** to own the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 拥有此文件或目录的**组**名称。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Specifies the desired permissions for the resource, in octal or symbolic notation.
trans-unit.target: 以八进制或符号表示法指定资源的所需权限。

trans-unit.source: (for example, 777 or rwxrwxrwx).
trans-unit.target: （例如，777 或 rwxrwxrwx）。

trans-unit.source: If using symbolic notation, do not provide the first character which indicates directory or file.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用符号表示法，不需提供指示文件或目录的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: DependsOn
trans-unit.target: DependsOn

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.
trans-unit.target: 指示必须先运行其他资源的配置，再配置此资源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the **ID** of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is **ResourceName** and its type is **ResourceType**, the syntax for using this property is `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要首先运行 **ID** 为 **ResourceName**、类型为 **ResourceType** 的资源配置脚本块，则使用此属性的语法为 `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`。

trans-unit.source: Additional Information
trans-unit.target: 其他信息

trans-unit.source: Linux and Windows use different line break characters in text files by default, and this can cause unexpected results when configuring some files on a Linux computer with __nxFile__.
trans-unit.target: Linux 和 Windows 在文本文件中默认使用不同的换行符，这可能会导致在 Linux 计算机上使用 __nxFile__ 配置某些文件时产生意外结果。

trans-unit.source: There are multiple ways to manage the content of a Linux file while avoiding issues caused by unexpected line break characters:
trans-unit.target: 有多种管理 Linux 文件内容，同时避免由意外换行符引起问题的方法：

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Copy the file from a remote source (http, https, or ftp): create a file on Linux with the desired contents, and stage it on a web or ftp server accessible the node(s) you will configure.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 1：从远程源（http、https 或 ftp）中复制文件：使用所需内容在 Linux 上创建一个文件，并将其暂存于能够访问将配置节点的网页或 ftp 服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Define the __SourcePath__ property in the __nxFile__ resource with the web or ftp URL to the file.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用该文件的 Web 或 ftp URL 在 __nxFile__ 资源中定义 __SourcePath__ 属性。

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Read the file contents in the PowerShell script with [Get-Content](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849787.aspx) after setting the __$OFS__ property to use the Linux line-break character.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 2：设置 __$OFS__ 属性以使用 Linux 换行符后，通过 [Get-Content](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849787.aspx) 来读取 PowerShell 脚本的内容。

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Use a PowerShell function to replace Windows line breaks with Linux line-break characters.
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3：使用 PowerShell 函数以将 Windows 换行符替换为 Linux 换行符。
